AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: tribe child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a tribe, running around the village, moving with the muffalo herds, learning essential skills from [PAWN_possessive] parents.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] never learned to read and never saw a other aeldari cultures or xenoraces.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: abandoned child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born sickly. Thinking that [PAWN_pronoun] would only burden the tribe, [PAWN_possessive] parents exposed [PAWN_objective] to the elements. Somehow, [PAWN_pronoun] survived.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: reclusive child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] didn't learn to speak until [PAWN_pronoun] was nearly five years old. Even then [PAWN_pronoun] preferred to keep to [PAWN_objective]self. \nTo the chagrin of [PAWN_possessive] caretakers, [PAWN_pronoun] made a habit of wandering off to live in the wilderness for weeks at a time.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: herder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] tended the muffalo herds, keeping them safe from predators and treating sick animals. It was quiet work, but [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed being away from people.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: scavenger
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood escaping grunt work to go digging through ruins for treasures. [PAWN_possessive] natural curiosity got [PAWN_objective] into a lot of trouble, but it also yielded many interesting finds.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: vengeful child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] returned to [PAWN_possessive] village to find that it had been wiped out by drukhari. [PAWN_pronoun] swore revenge on the attackers and began a violent rampage across the wilderness.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: fire keeper
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for keeping the tribe's fire going. [PAWN_pronoun] took this responsibility very seriously.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: hideaway
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s overprotective parents encouraged [PAWN_objective] to stay at home nearly every day. Though [PAWN_pronoun] had a lot of time to read and pursue crafting hobbies, [PAWN_pronoun] never developed normal social skills.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: budding artist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a knack for art. Traders and collectors from many different societies sought to buy [PAWN_possessive] creations.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: bully
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] tormented other children for fun. To keep [PAWN_objective] busy, an elder assigned [PAWN_objective] to a hunting party at an early age.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: bookworm
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Rather than socialize with the other children, [PAWN_nameDef] preferred to get lost in literature. [PAWN_pronoun] taught [PAWN_objective]self to read at an early age with books bought from passing traders.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: sole survivor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s entire tribe was wiped out in a raid. Though [PAWN_pronoun] was adopted by another group, [PAWN_pronoun] was emotionally scarred, and preferred to stay near home, cooking and tending crops.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: bonesinger assistant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked for the bonesinger of {PAWN_possessive} tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] helped in the cutting of psychoplastics, transferred materials and finished products. Because of this, [PAWN_pronoun] worked less in the field.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: healer's assistant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: The [PAWN_nameDef]'s parent was a priest of Isha. The [PAWN_nameDef] communicated with patients and learned how to treat wounds.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: native of craftworld
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] and {PAWN_possessive} family once came here from the craftworld and they managed to integrate into the tribe. [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in the village, although [PAWN_pronoun] was weaker than his peers.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: dreamer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was impressed by the corsairs who came to {PAWN_possessive} village. [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to go to the stars when [PAWN_pronoun] grew up.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: scared child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: An accident that happened to [PAWN_nameDef] while working with dragons has permanently settled the fear of animals. Because of this, [PAWN_nameDef] rarely left the settlement, working in the garden or helping in construction.
